name: Drawy
description:
Drawy is an interactive drawing game that can be played with your Twitch chat! You as a streamer draw the word and your chat tries to find the word by typing it to your chat.

Each round the winning player gets points with respect to time. At the end the player with the most points wins!

Drawy is available in multiple languages with more coming soon! Have an interactive fun with your chat with more than 1000 friendly words and show your crazy drawing skills!

Please note that you need to have a Twitch account to play the game.
